pyzui.mandeltileprovider module¶

Dynamic tile provider for the Mandelbrot set.

class pyzui.mandeltileprovider.MandelTileProvider(tilecache)[source]¶

Bases: DynamicTileProvider

MandelTileProvider objects are used for generating tiles of the Mandelbrot set using jrMandel (<http://freshmeat.net/projects/jrmandel/>).

Constructor: MandelTileProvider(TileCache)

Create a new TileProvider for loading tiles into the given tilecache.

filext = 'png'¶
tilesize = 256¶
aspect_ratio = 1.0¶
_load_dynamic(tile_id, outfile)[source]¶

Perform whatever actions necessary to load the tile identified by the given tile_id into the location given by outfile.

_load_dynamic(tuple<string,int,int,int>, string)
